about_blog_1: Kung hilig mo ang pagsusulat, tandaan na ang aming blog ay bukas upang i-post ang iyong mga inilathalang tyutoryal. Kung may sarili kang blog at may naisulat ka na tungkol sa Phalcon, pwede kaming maglathala sa aming mga social network na pahina upang makamit ang pinakamalawak na bisibilidad. Kung ang iyong blog ay nakasulat sa wika maliban sa Ingles, gusto naming ibahagi ito at posibleng isalin ito kung maaari. Kung may alam ka sa mga blog na may kaugnayan sa PHP na gustong ilahad ang proyekto sa mambabasa nito mangyaring ipaalam ito sa amin.
about_description_1: Ang mga kamangha-manghang proyekto ay nangangailangan ng kahanga-hangang mga kamay. Maaaring hindi pa namin kayo kilala, ngunit para sa amin, bagay na bagay kayo sa pagbuo ng isang mas magandang web. Basta sama-sama, kaya nating baguhin ang mundo! Dito sa Phalcon, nagtatayo kami ng isang makabagong henerasyon na balangkas para sa PHP; gusto naming bigyan ka ng kakaibang pagganap habang tinutulungan kang bumuo sa isang madali at masayang paraan.
about_description_2: Kami'y umaasa na masisiyahan kayo sa Phalcon gaya namin. Palagi naming tatanggapin ang iyong pakikipag-ugnayan at pakikipagtulungan!Hindi kailangang maging isang C developer ka para makaambag sa Phalcon! May maraming pa kaming mga aspeto na maaari mong ambagan:
about_documentation_1:
Makikita ang paminggalan ng websayt na ito sa github. Ang paminggalan na ito ay ang pinagkukuhaan namin ng dokumentasyon para sa wikang Ingles lamang!

Lubos naming pinahahalagahan ang mga pagwawasto, mga karagdagan at mga pagpapaganda sa aming dokumentasyon, kaya ang kailangan niyo lang gawin ay kopyahin ang paminggalan at mag-isyu ng isang pull na kahilingan!

Kung kaya mong tulungan ang mga Ingles na tagabuo sa pagsasalin ng ilang lathala sa ibang wika, aba'y maganda! Gumagamit kami ng :3: para sa aming mga pagsasalin, at pwede mong tingnan ang aming mga proyekto dito.
about_evangelism_1: May marami pa ring tao na hindi alam na mayroong Phalcon at ang katotohanang gumagana ito. Sigurado kami na maraming tagabuo ang makakabenepisyo sa pagkaroon ng kaalaman tungkol sa Phalcon at kung paano ito makakatulong sa kanila. Kung may alam kang kahit anong pagtitipon na may kinalaman sa PHP, at gusto mong magsalita ukol sa proyekto, makakaasa kayo sa aming suporta. Sino ba naman ang ayaw malaman ang mga kasangkapan sa pagpapabuti sa pagbuo ng PHP?
about_flying_with_phalcon: Salamat sa paglipad kasama ang Phalcon! <3
about_sample_apps_1: Ang mga kakaibang halimbawa ay nakakatulong sa iba upang lubos na maunawan kung paano malilikha ang mga malalaking bagay sa Phalcon. Huwag mag-alanganing ibahagi ng mga repositori sa mga halimbawang aplikasyon na nakakatulong sa iba sa kanilang trabaho at hayaan din silang magbigay ng tugon sa mga likha mo!
about_screencasts_1: Gusto nating lahat ang mga screencast. Kung may sobra kayong oras at gustong suportahan ang komunidad sa pamamagitan ng mga magagandang video na magtuturo ng kahit ano tungkol sa mga katangian ng balangkas, malugod naming tatanggapin ito. Tingnan ang amingVimeo Channel bilang gabay.
about_share_experiences_1: Huwag kang mahiya, huwag mag-alinlangang ibahagi ang mga pamamaraan kung paano makakatulong ang Phalcon sa 'yo at sa komunidad. Kung naging matagumpay ka sa Phalcon, ibahagi natin yan sa madla. Pag-usapan din natin ang mga aspeto na kailangan pa ng kalinangan, kung anong mga trabaho ang pwedeng padaliin, at kung anu-anong mga pakinabang ang nakuha mo sa paggamit ng Phalcon. Hindi man maipatupad kaagad, ang iyong mga mungkahi sa mga bagong hiling na katangian ay maaaring makatulong ito sa amin sa pagbuo sa kinabukasan ng proyekto. Ang iyong tugon ay makakatulong sa ating lahat.
about_social_networks_1: Araw-araw nagbabago ang Phalcon dahil sa aming pagnanais na pagandahin pa ito. Bahagi na ng ating buhay ang mga social network at nakikipag-ugnayan tayo sa isa't isa gamit ang mga ito. Ang paglalahad ng iyong karanasan sa Phalcon sa iyong mga kakilala ay lubos na mapapataas sa bisibilidad ng proyekto. Mas maraming mga tao ang makikilahok sa aming komunidad, kaya magiging mas malakas ito, pati na ang pagdami ng tanyag na katangian at pagsikat nito. Gaya ng, '+1', magbahagi ng mga lathala na patuloy naming ibinabahagi sa bawat social network at makikipag-ugnayan sa mga talakayan tungkol sa mga ito. Ang mga taong nakahanap ng Phalcon sa pamamagitan ng iyong mga pakikipag-ugnayan ay siguradong magpapasalamat sa iyo!
about_social_networks_2: Naroon kami sa halos lahat ng mga sikat na social network. Sa pagsubaybay sa amin, tinutulungan mo kaming makita ang proyekto ng mas nakararami:
about_sponsoring_1: Kaunti man lang kami, kami ay epektibong koponan ng mga tagabuo na masikap na nagtatrabaho. Sinisikap naming paglaanan ng mas maraming oras hangga't maaari ang paggawa ng proyekto. Ang aming dedikasyon sa proyektong ito ang naghimok na lalong pagandahin pa namin ito. Ang Phalcon ay isang software na bukas sa mga mapagkukunan, at kailangan ang mga boluntaryong tulong para sa maiging paglinang nito. Pwede mo kaming tulungang panatilihing aktibo ang paglinang sa pamamagitan ng pagbibigay ng donasyon sa proyekto o pag-iisponsor sa paglilinang. Ang mas maraming oras at mga mapagkukunan na nakatuon sa proyekto ay nangangahulugan ng mas maraming aktibidad, maiging pagpapabuti, mas malugod na suporta, mas kamangha-manghang mga katangian, atbp.
about_tests_1: Walang software na nakakaligtas sa bugs. Kung makakapansin ka ng isa, mangyaring huwag mag-atubiling ipaalam sa amin. Mayroon kaming hanay ng mga pagsubok na may higit sa 16,000 na mga pagsusulit. Gayunpaman, ang mga pagsubok na yunit ay hindi sapat. Tulungan mo kaming pabutihin ang aming hanay ng mga pagsubok sa pamamagitan ng pagdaragdag ng higit pang mga pagsubok o pagbutihin ang mga ito. Ang bawat idinagdag na pagsusuri ay nakakatulong patatagin ang balangkas.
about_thank_you_1: Pinapasalamatan namin ang lahat ng aming mga tagaambag at mga miyembro ng komunidad para sa pagtulak sa amin upang gawing pinakamahusay na balangkas ang Phalcon. Ang iyong mga mabubuting salita at pakikipag-ugnayan ay kung ano ang nag-uudyok sa amin na pagandahin pa ang aming trabaho. Inaasahan naming matugunan at lampasan ang tiwala na ibinibigay mo sa Phalcon.
about_translations_1: Sinusubukan naming maabot ang maraming mga developer hangga't maaari, habang nilalagpasan ang pagkakaiba sa pananalita. Ginagamit namin ang :2:, upang matugunan ang lahat ng mga salita o pangungusap na kailangang isalin para sa websayt na ito. Ang repositori ng proyekto ay matatagpuan dito.
acl_1: Ito ang paraan sa paggawa ng access control list (ACL):
acl_3: Ang default na aksyon ay DENY access
acl_4: Magrehistro ng dalawang tungkulin, Ang mga gumagamit ay mga nakarehistrong gumagamit
acl_5: at ang mga bumibisita ay mga gumagamit nang walang pagkakakilanlan
acl_description: Ang Access Control List ay nagpapahintulot sa mga gumagamit sa pag-akses ng mga aspeto kung saan sila ay may pahintulot
auto_loader_1: Irehistro ang mga agwat-pangalan, panlapi, direktoryo o klase. Samantalahin ang mga kaganapan ng autoloader at mapanatili ang ganap na kontrol sa kung anong mga file ang na-load at kung saan ito nagmula.
autoloader_description: Nagbibigay ng mekanismo ng pag-autoload ng mga klase ng PHP na sumusunod sa PSR-4.
cache_1: Ang bahagi ng cache ay nagbibigay-daan sa mas mabilis na pag-access sa mga madalas na ginagamit o na-proseso na data. Sinusuportahan nito ang maraming mga backends tulad ng Redis, Memcached, Mongo, Files, Apc at higit pa
cache_2: Itakda ang serbisyong pangmodelo ng cache
cache_3: Isang araw na datos ng cache bilang default
cache_4: Mga setting ng koneksyon sa Memcached
cache_description: Pagbutihin ang iyong pagganap sa marami sa mga backend cache na binibigay ng Phalcon
consulting_header: Nakipag-anib kami sa LEZGRO, isang kumpanya na dalubhasa sa paglinang ng web at mobile application at subok na sa paghahatid ng mga aplikasyon na pinapatakbo ng Phalcon sa kanilang mga kliente.
consulting_lezgro_1: Binabati kayo ng LEZGRO sa pagpili ng Phalcon bilang sentral sa inyong talaksang pangteknolohiya!
consulting_lezgro_2: Nang magsimula ang aming kompanya noong 2003, sinubukan namin ang sari-saring mga teknolohiya at stratehiya sa pagbuo ng software.
consulting_lezgro_3: Ang mga tagpangasiwa ng produkto, CTOs at mga tagatatag na hindi pangteknikal ay nagsasangkot sa LEZGRO sa paggawa ng mga produktong kakaiba sa mabilis na paraan at may mataas na kalidad.
consulting_lezgro_4: Ngayong may nakuha na tayong karanasan kasama ang Phalcon, inaanyayahan namin kayo sa paggawa ng mga desisyon sa paglinang sa Phalcon, at tulungan kayong dalhin ang inyong produktong Phalcon sa merkado.
consulting_lezgro_5: Kontakin ang LEZGRO sa pamamagitan ng aming websayt, kung saan makikita nyo rin ang mga halimbawa at katibayan sa aming mga gawa.
consulting_mctekk_1: Lumipat ang MCTekk sa Phalcon noong una pa. Sa kanyang simula, makikita natin ang mga kalamangan sa mga ibinibigay ng Phalcon at ang mga maibibigay pa nila sa hinaharap.
consulting_mctekk_2: May marami kaming karanasan kasama ang Phalcon at nakabuo na kami ng napakaraming proyekto kung saan ang Phalcon ang sentro. Nandito kami upang bigyan kayo ng payo sa lahat ng pangangailangan ninyong may kinalaman sa Phalcon upang mapabuti ang inyong kahandaan, bilis at kalidad.
consulting_mctekk_3: Kontakin kami gamit ang aming websayt, kung saan makikita ninyo ang mga proyekto na aming ginagawa.
consulting_mctekk_header: Naihatid na ng MCTekK ang iba't ibang mga makateknolohiyang proyektong Phalcon, kung saan ang kanilang pangunahing lakas ay ang web at mobile development.
contributors_description: Araw-araw, pinapabuti ng ating kahanga-hangang komunidad ang Phalcon
crypt_description: I-encrypt/decrypt ang mahahalagang datos upang ligtas sila sa mga hindi otorisadong partido
dependency_injection_1: Phalcon is built upon a powerful yet easy to understand and use pattern called Dependency Injection. Initialize or define services once - and use them virtually anywhere throughout the application.
dependency_injection_description: Dependency Injection and Location of services and it's itself a container for them.
download_arch_1: There is a PKGBUILD for ArchLinux, available here
download_compilation_1: On Linux you can easily compile and install the extension from source code.
download_compilation_11: 1. To create the extension from C source follow these steps:
download_compilation_12: 2. Add the extension to your php.ini:
download_cpanel_1: After requests from the community, the cPanel developers released a custom module that allows for installation of Phalcon in cPanel hosted sites. Information can be found here. The module is maintained in Github.
download_dependencies_1: Although Phalcon does not binary link to other extensions it does use some of them to offer functionality. The extensions used are:
download_dependencies_2: It is not necessary for all the above extensions to be present in the system that has Phalcon installed. You can only install the ones that meet your needs. For instance if you use a MySQL database, then you can only load PDO and PDO/MySQL ignoring the Oracle, SQlite, Postgresql and Mongo.
download_devtools_1: These tools are a collection of useful scripts to generate skeleton code. Core components of your application can be generated with a simple command, allowing you to easily develop applications using Phalcon.
download_devtools_composer_1: Install composer in a common location or in your project:
download_devtools_composer_2: Create the composer.json file as follows:
download_devtools_composer_4: Create a symbolic link to the phalcon.php script:
download_devtools_download: You can download or clone a cross platform package containing the developer tools from Github.
download_docker_1: There are many ways that you can use Phalcon with Docker.
download_docker_2: Our official images are located here. We always welcome pull requests and improvements. The repository for the docker files is located here:
download_docker_3: With Phalcon-compose you can create an isolated environment with docker, that will allow you to use Phalcon without any additional installations. Note that using Phalcon Compose, requires

download_docker_7: Phalcon Compose is very easy to use. Assume that you need to create an application that will be located in:
download_docker_8: We will now need to run the following command for our container application can be created:
download_docker_9: The above command will download the skeleton of the docker environment.

download_docker_16: Open your hosts file (/etc/hosts) and enter a new line like this:
download_docker_17: You might want to edit the docker-compose.yml file and remove services that you will not be using. Phalcon Compose offers a lot of services as mentioned above, so your application might not need some of them. Removing the relevant services from the docker-compose.yml file will reduce memory usage of your environment.

download_freebsd_1: A port is available for FreeBSD. You only need these few commands to install it:
download_ide_stubs_1: The video below outlines how to enable IDE stubs for PhpStorm
download_need_help_1: Have a look at our support page for ways to get support. We will do our best to help you.
download_note: Phalcon is a C extension, so you need to download a binary for your platform or compile it from source code.
download_opensuse_1: There is a package available here (thanks to Mariusz Łączak)
download_requirements_1: We need some packages previously installed:
download_source_code: Source Code: github
download_source_code_switch: Source Code (please switch to the relevant branch): github
download_ubuntu: To install Phalcon on Ubuntu or Debian you need to follow these steps:
download_ubuntu_1: If you are missing apt-add-repository run the following command:
download_ubuntu_2: If you wish to install the legacy version of Phalcon (1.x) use the following PPA:
download_vagrant_1: Vagrant is an excellent tool to create and configure lightweight, reproducible, and portable development environments.
download_vagrant_2: Use any of the following boxes to test or develop with Phalcon on a pre-configured environment.
download_windows_dlls: Windows DLLs can be downloaded from our Github release page here
download_windows_installation_1: To use phalcon on Windows you can download a DLL library. Edit your php.ini, append at the end, and restart your webserver to load the extension. More.
download_windows_note: We highly recommend you use the latest version of PHP corresponding to our DLLs, so as to take advantage of the full feature set of Phalcon.
encryption_1: Phalcon provides encryption facilities via the Phalcon\Crypt component. This class offers simple object-oriented wrappers to the openssl PHP's encryption library.
encryption_2: This is a secret key (32 bytes).
encryption_3: This is the text that you want to encrypt.
events_description: Extend the most of the framework components by setting 'hook points'. Create your own events and make your application more flexible and powerful
events_management_1: An EventsManager allows us to attach listeners to a particular type of event. The type that interests us now is 'dispatch'. The following code filters all events produced by the Dispatcher:
events_management_3: Listen for events produced in the dispatcher using the Security plugin
events_management_4: Handle exceptions and not-found exceptions using NotFoundPlugin
events_management_5: Assign the events manager to the dispatcher
flash_messages_1: Use the flash notifier to show notifications to a user in a web application:
flash_messages_2: there were errors in this form
flash_messages_4: this is a notice for users
flash_messages_description: Flash messages are used to notify the user about the state of actions.
forms_builder_1: Each element in the form can be rendered as required by the developer. Internally, Phalcon\Tag is used to produce the correct HTML for each element and you can pass additional HTML attributes as the second parameter of render():
header_slogan: Ang kanyang makabagong arkitektura ay ginawa ang Phalcon na pinakamabilis na balangkas ng PHP na nagawa!
header_tagline: Ang isang full-stack na balangkas ng PHP na nagsilbing C-extension
high_performance_php_framework: Magandang Pagganap ng Balangkas na PHP
hosting_amazon_ec2_1: Ang Amazon Elastic Compute Cloud ay naghahatid ng masukat, magbayad-kapag-ikaw-ay-umalis na kapasidad sa pag-compute sa cloud.
hosting_amazon_ec2_2: Pumili ng isang na-configure na, naka-template na Amazon Machine Image (AMI) upang makatayo at makapagsimula kaagad. O maglikha ng isang AMI na naglalaman ng iyong mga aplikasyon, mga library, mga datos at katulad na setting ng konpigurasyon. Magtingin pa
hosting_aspnix_1: ASPnix provides superior Linux cPanel and Windows web hosting services. Our customers have rated our service as outstanding. We offer economical plans for shared Windows and Linux cPanel web hosting, Virtual private servers and dedicated servers! See more
hosting_aspnix_2: Phalcon is supported on all Windows and Linux cPanel shared web hosting packages and plans, no configuration or installation required! ASPnix offers a variety of PHP versions from 5.2 - 7.2 as well as many additional extensions!
hosting_azure_1: The Windows Azure cloud provides you with highly scalable and manageable Windows hosting for your web apps. Use Phalcon to reduce your instance costs.
hosting_azure_2: To install Phalcon, follow the step by step procedure in this SitePoint article.
hosting_description: Phalcon can be installed on any machine on which the hosting provider offers SSH root access (or sudo). Below is a list of reputable companies that offer such services:
hosting_digital_ocean_1: Blazing Fast Cloud Technology. Built for developers. Deploy an SSD cloud server in 55 seconds. See more
hosting_digital_ocean_2: Follow this tutorial to get started
hosting_dcthost_1: DCT Host offers multiple affordable and high quality hosting plans.
hosting_dcthost_2: By default, they have Phalcon installed on all their shared hosting packages.
hosting_fortrabbit_1: Fortrabbit offers many hosting plans (there is one for developers and is free - with some limitations) that would satisfy the needs of most of the developers that wish to either try Phalcon or deploy their applications using it.
hosting_fortrabbit_2: They offer a variety of extensions that would satisfy even the most demanding project.
hosting_fortrabbit_3: Stable versions of Phalcon are pre-installed, you can activate them from the administration dashboard.
hosting_install_instructions: Install Phalcon using the standard instructions of installation.
hosting_kinghost_1: Since 2006, KingHost is one of the largest hosting company sites in Brazil and already has over 300,000 sites hosted with approximately 60,000 customers. Headquartered in Porto Alegre (RS) , with data centers in Brazil , the company offers the hosting service of shared servers, specific plans for custom developers and projects in the area of enterprise solutions , including cloud computing and dedicated servers. It also offers digital marketing solutions such as email marketing and security solutions.
hosting_layershift_1: Next generation, auto-sizing PaaS for Java, PHP, Ruby, Python, and Node.js apps. Fully isolated self-scaling role-based containers for each customer, including choice of Apache or Nginx, and full range of SQL and NoSQL servers. Pay for resource usage, not server instance size. SSD-powered. UK hosted.
hosting_layershift_2: Follow this tutorial to get started
hosting_linode_1: Deploy and Manage Linux Virtual Servers in the Linode Cloud. Get a server running in seconds with your choice of Linux distro, resources, and node location. See more
hosting_mediasecure_1: High performance Dedicated Servers with protection against threats including Distributed Denial of Service (DDoS) attacks. Our high-capacity DDoS-Protected network can automatically protect your dedicated server from DDoS attacks up to 4.2 Tbps. See more
hosting_rackspace_1: Cloud Servers are virtual machines running Linux or Windows® Server in the Rackspace Cloud. You can scale resources like CPU, memory, and storage up or down, depending on your needs. Best of all, you can pay as you go. See more
hosting_webfaction_1: WebFaction Hosting for developers. Full shell access to fast servers with all your favorite tools pre-installed and maintained for the user.
hosting_webfaction_2: To install Phalcon in WebFaction, follow the instructions outlined here
i18n_1: The component Phalcon\Translate aids in creating multilingual applications. Applications using this component, display content in different languages, based on the user's chosen language supported by the application.
i18n_2: Ask browser what is the best language
i18n_3: Check if we have a translation file for that lang
i18n_description: Translate your applications to many languages easily
join_our_community: Come join our vibrant developer community!
join_our_community_description: Community contributions in Extensions, Plugins, Adapters, VM, examples, source code... and more
license_new_bsd:
Phalcon is an open-source PHP framework
built as a C-extension. It is available under the
new BSD License.
low_overhead_1: Zephir/C extensions are loaded together with PHP one time on the web server's daemon start process
low_overhead_2: Classes and functions provided by the extension are ready to use for any application
low_overhead_3: The code is compiled and isn't interpreted because it's already compiled to a specific platform and processor
low_overhead_4: Thanks to its low-level architecture and optimizations Phalcon provides the lowest overhead for MVC-based applications
low_overhead_description: Low memory consumption and CPU compared to traditional frameworks
mvc_1: Build single and multi-module applications with ease and pleasure. Using the file structure, scheme and patterns you already know.
mvc_hmvc_description: Modules, components, models, views and controllers
odm_for_mongo_1: In addition to its ability to map tables in relational databases, Phalcon can map documents to a MongoDB database. The ODM offers a CRUD functionality, events, validations among other services.
odm_for_mongo_3: How many mechanical robots are there?
orm_1: A powerful ORM is provided by Phalcon allowing you to manipulate database records as classes and objects. MySQL, PostgreSQL and SQLite are supported out of the box.
phalcon_team_2: Phalcon is and has always been an effort of many volunteers:
phql_1: PHQL is a high-level, object-oriented SQL dialect that allows to write queries using a standardized SQL-like language. PHQL is implemented as a parser (written in C) that translates syntax in that of the target RDBMS. To achieve the highest performance possible, Phalcon provides a parser that uses the same technology as SQLite. This technology provides a small in-memory parser with a very low memory footprint that is also thread-safe.
phql_description: The powerful and secure Phalcon Query Language, PHQL
polling_app: A polling app built from scratch in < 15 min
queueing_1: Activities like processing videos, resizing images or sending emails aren't suitable to be executed online or in real time because it may slow the loading time of pages and severely impact the user experience. The best solution here is to implement background jobs. The web application puts jobs into a queue and which will be processed separately.
queueing_3: Insert the job in the queue
queueing_description: Use the built-in queueing system in Phalcon to schedule jobs and reduce the load of your web server
rest_description: In this case, you can use either a micro or full stack application to meet your goal. In addition, a powerful set of HTTP helpers.
restful_services_1: Writing REST servers and applications has never been easier. No boilerplate. Simple services will fit in one file.
router_1: Routing as it supposed to be. Nothing more. Nothing less.
sharding_2: This service returns a MySQL database
sharding_3: This service returns a PostgreSQL database
sharding_description: Connect, store and retrieve data from many database systems at the same time
sponsors_description_1: For those that wish to sponsor our work and further the development of Phalcon, we offer various sponsorship options that will fit any budget. Sponsoring our work allows us to devote more time to the project, offer faster responses to bugs and features and ensure the projects's stability.
sponsors_our_great_sponsors: These are our sponsors! Thank you!!
support_documentation_1: Kung maaari ay gamitin ang :1: bago ang iba pa. Maaarin niyo ring gamitin ang search feature sa ating mga dokumento upang hanapin ang inyong mga hinahanap. Kung ang inyong tanong ay hindi pa nasasagot, marami pang mga opsyon sa ibaba.
support_note_1: Ang ating mahusay na komunidad at mga taga-ambag ay masayang makatulong! Pakigamit ang mga kagamitang ito ng komunidad upang makakuha ng tulong.
support_note_2: Maraming mga bug ang nagsilabas dahil ang mga gumagamit ay hindil pinagana ang pinakabagong bersyon. Maaaring bumisita sa :1:, i-download ang pinakabagong magagamit na bersyon (o i-compile ito) at kompirmahin kung ang issue na iyong naranasan ay isa nga bang bug.
support_phalcon_forum: Ang mga tanong ay dapat mapunta sa Opisyal na mga Pagtitipon
support_please_note_1: Ang Stack Overflow ay hindi binuo upang suportahan ang Phalcon
support_please_note_2: Kung maaari ay huwag magpalabas ng mga bagong bug doon. Pakigamit ang issue tracker ng Github para dito
support_please_note_3: Kung maaari ay huwag magtanong para sa mga hinihiling na feature doon. Pakigamit ang issue trackeras Github para dito
support_please_note_4: Siguraduhin na nalakip niyo ang 'phalcon' na tag kasama ang inyong tanong
support_please_note_5: Siguraduhin niyo na nabanggit ang 'Phalcon' sa tanong
support_reporting_a_bug_0: Kung naniniwala parin kayo na isang bug ang inyong nakita, pakiusap buksan ang issue
support_reporting_a_bug_1: Pakiusap ipagbigay-alam ang mga bug kung kayo ay napapagod na sa lahat ng mga opsyon sa itaas, gamitin ang issue trackersa Github.
support_slack: Mayroong hindi masyadong aktibo pero gumagana parin na komunidad sa Slack
support_stack_overflow: Ang ibang paraan ay ang magtanong sa Stack Overflowat i-tag ito kasama ang phalcon
support_social_network_accounts: Ang aming mga account sa social network ay: Gab.ai,Twitter at Facebook
team_andres_1: Andres is no stranger to open source projects. In the last nine years, he has designed and released frameworks for PHP and has been involved in web development - his main passion.
team_andres_2: A TR35 winner, Andres' main drive is to always choose and implement or use the right tool for the job, mostly focused on performance. Therefore in 2011 a new idea was in the works; to create a new kind of framework for PHP developers, one that focuses on usability, features and mostly performance.
team_andres_3: Through this new innovative approach Phalcon was born. A PHP framework written in C that can offer a wealth of features to developers while maximizing performance and keeping resource utilization low.
team_andres_4: Andres is one of the core developers of Phalcon and its inspiration.
team_eduar_1: Eduar is a C/PHP developer with several years of experience in application development. He is one of the founders and lead developers of the Phalcon project which began in 2011.
team_eduar_2: He has taken part in all areas, from the framework design to the internal kernel functions, including documentation and developer tools. He is driven by a fascination with frameworks, languages and new technologies.
team_eduar_3: Eduar likes science fiction movies and sometimes plays football.
team_nikolay_1: Nikolay has been developing web applications for over 10 years. He has been involved in high performance as well as complex websites and designs.
team_nikolay_2: Nikolay has been working with Open Source projects for a long time, utilizing them whenever requirements allow. He thus started using his personal time to give back to the community, by forking projects, offering architectural changes and suggestions, as well as performance ones. He has been instrumental in improving Open Source CMS projects receiving positive feedback from the community.
team_nikolay_3: His continuous involvement with open source projects has helped him advance his technical knowledge while abiding by the give back to the community mentality.
team_nikolay_4: Nikolay is an avid supporter of maximizing performance in web applications. After his introduction to Phalcon, he decided to pursue and use the project and become an Evangelist for it. He is leading the effort toward the Russian community and offers resources for Russian speaking developers.
team_nikolay_5: His contributions include: A mirror of the main website in Russian (http://www.phalcon.ru), a mirror of the documentation repository in Russian (http://docs.phalconphp.ru), ongoing changes and corrections to the documentation in English, a group in the social network Vkontakte (https://vk.com/phalconphp).
team_nikos_1: Nikos has been in the IT industry for over 20 years. He was introduced to the PHP world in 2000 and has been using it ever since in personal projects as well as projects for his employers.
team_nikos_2: He loves discovering new technologies and ways to integrate them with existing applications and thus reap the benefits they offer.
team_nikos_3: He is an avid supporter of Test Driven Development (TDD) and always tries to get full coverage in his code.
team_nikos_4: Nikos' continuing interest in new and innovative technologies breaking out of the norm introduced him to Phalcon. He joined the core team and his tasks mainly involve coordination of NFRs and bug fixes, help with tests, documentation and the incubator. Nikos is also responsible for maintaining the Windows DLLs for the project and offers support whenever possible.
team_paul_1: Paul considers himself very lucky to have spent the last decade of his life writing user-friendly software with the help of open source frameworks and tools like Phalcon. As a result, he spends his off-work hours trying to improve FOSS tools and the lives of other developers like himself. He has a strong need for simple code and self-evident UX, with Phalcon he focuses on documentation, new user experience, contributor relations, and community outreach.
team_paul_2: Paul recently started his own company to follow his passion of building intuitive software with emerging technologies like, ReactJS, Webpack, Ruby, and Elixir(Erlang). He now proudly adds Zephir and Phalcon to that ever growing list and is happy to take on the role of cheerleader, advocating their innovative features.
team_paul_3: On the chance he isn't coding, Paul is following in his wife's footsteps and developing his interest in videography and video production. He operates an educational YouTube channel currently focused on Phalcon and as needed as a Computer Science lecturer.
team_serghei_1: Serghei has been working as a Ruby/PHP developer for over 8 years and has been specializing in web application development. As a supporter and advocate of Behavior Driven Development (BDD) is also a member of the Codeception team.
team_serghei_2: Serghei can be found neck deep in innovative technologies which introduced him in Phalcon. He is responsible for the coordination of bug fixes, testing, developer tools, incubator and support other Phalcon-related projects.
team_serghei_3: When he's not working, Serghei enjoys watch documentaries, science fiction movies and sometimes plays Mahjong or Go.
team_volodymyr_1: Volodymyr has been developing server and web applications for over 20 years. He has been involved in designing and writing very complex and high performance software applications. Volodymyr’s passion for writing fast, robust and optimized software introduced him to Phalcon and he joined the development team.
team_volodymyr_2: In his free time Volodymyr enjoys the company of his beloved wife, contributes to open source projects, and studies foreign languages.
template_engine_volt_1: Volt is an ultra-fast and designer friendly templating language written in Zephir/C for PHP. It provides you a set of helpers to write views in an easy way. Volt is highly integrated with other components of Phalcon, just as you can use it as a stand-alone component in your applications.
template_engine_volt_description: A template engine inspired by Jinja but built in C for PHP
template_engines_1: Views represent the user interface of your application. Views are often HTML files with embedded PHP code that perform tasks related solely to the presentation of the data. Views handle the job of providing data to the web browser or other tool that is used to make requests from your application.
template_engines_description: Views represent the user interface of your application
testimonials_1: Greetings, Phalcon team! I have a project, built on Phalcon framework. It's a Guitarama (:2:) - guitars tabs and chords catalog. The site is aimed at the Russian audience, and uses the Russian language, but I hope, there will be no problem to understand most of pages. The site was re-launched on a new platform in the beginning of January, 2013 and has since shown steady growth. Current daily visits: ~1500 unique visitors, ~5000 page views. The site is running on an old physical server 1хP4-3Ghz, 4GB RAM. Once again, thank you for a great framework and all what you are doing: ) Michael.
testimonials_2: Hello, Phalcon team. I would like to share with you our success story of using Phalcon in :2: and :4: projects, the most visited and highloaded sites in Kazakhstan, ranked in TOP-10 classified sites in the CIS. Both sites work on single RESTful-like API written on Phalcon\Mvc\Micro. On peak loads API processes something like 400 req/sec and this is not a limit. Moving to Phalcon allowed us to reduce response generation time and the consumption of CPU and RAM, as well as to reduce the time of development process. We will continue using Phalcon in our new projects. Thank you for the great work you are doing! Best regards, Nikita Vershinin, Lead Developer, Kolesa.kz and krisha.kz
testimonials_3: Phalcon Team, The framework you guys have created is amazing. I've never used a framework that has combined speed, efficiency, brevity, and naturality all in one package. I intend on championing and contributing back to the project in any way that I can. I embarked recently on an ~800 hour project and am happy to say that we are using Phalcon Framework. Bravo. Brian Seymour
testimonials_4: Hi guys, I just ran across Phalcon and it's just awesome! I've merely wanted to say to you how awesome you are! So, thanks for this framework and keep up the good work! Ivan Penchev
testimonials_5: Hi Guys, i wrote simple url-shortener service with phalcon. That was amazing! really. :2:. Demo is here: :4:) Murat Küçükosman
testimonials_6: Hello Phalcon Team, I created a small project designed for Polish users using your framework. I have to admit that the performance is amazing, congratulations good job. Service to validate the content of the web pages in Polish language :2:
testimonials_7: Hi guys! Just wanted to share with you the latest release of our old project - :2: . Switching to phalcon allowed us to halve the server load compared to the previous framework, which is great!
testimonials_description: Below is a collection of testimonials and success stories, from you, the developers and users of Phalcon PHP. We always welcome emails with success stories and will be posting those in our blog. If you wish to send us your success story or get in touch with us, feel free to mail us at :2:.
transactions_1: When a process performs multiple database operations, it might be important that each step is completed successfully so that data integrity can be maintained. Transactions offer the ability to ensure that all database operations have been executed successfully before the data is committed to the database.
transactions_4: Get the robots to be deleted
transactions_5: Something's gone wrong, we should rollback the transaction
transactions_6: Everything's gone fine, let's commit the transaction
transactions_description: Transactions in Phalcon allows to keep the data integrity safe.
